dict.acceptation: 对比，对照；差异；对照物，对立面；[摄]反差；
使对照，使对比；和…形成对照；

sent.orig: Adjustment of level, contrast as well as saturation of all submissions are allowed.
sent.trans: 允许对相片进行加光(Level)、对比度(Contrast)以及饱和度(Saturation)的调效。

sent.orig: Experiments indicate that our contrast technique is not sensitive to contrast dose, flow rate, acoustic pressure.
sent.trans: 证明本文提出的造影成像方案对声压、流速、造影剂浓度在一定范围内不敏感。

sent.orig: ObjectiveTo introduce a simple double contrast enteranography-double contrast examination in the dynamic and unpiped condition.
sent.trans: 目的介绍一种简易的小肠双对比造影法———小肠动力位无管法双对比造影。

sent.orig: The higher contrast coefficients, description of the film's ability to contrast difference.
sent.trans: 反不不差系数越矮，外明胶片纪录明暗不不差比不不差的不梢不发越不小。

sent.orig: Methods A study of randomized double-blind contrast test was performed with piracetam as contrast medicine.
sent.trans: 方法采用随机双盲对照试验，对照药物为吡拉西坦。
